questions.explanation:
fountain.

	"One day I will build a fountain,drink and never grow old."

questions.text: "One day I will find the secret to your ________________________"
questions.explanation:
social chemistry.

	"One day I will find the secret to your social chemistryThen I'll print it on a t-shirt, and it'll make you wanna be with me."

questions.text: "It just measures out the distance, and then __________ the folks between."
questions.explanation:
eliminates.

	"I can't stand to wait in line long, So I built a new machine. It just measures out the distance And then eliminates the folks between."

questions.text: " That we can use to ____________ your lips to mine if you were here."
questions.explanation:
re-adhere & readhere.

	"All my stuffs completely naturalAnd when we're doneWe'll boil 'em down for glueThat we can use to re-adhereYour lips to mine if you were here."

A satellite.

	"One day I'll construct a sateliteAnd I'll name it after you'Cause you were the greatest friend of allExcept for when you split my lip in two."

questions.text: What has the singer not had much of?
questions.explanation:
Self-respect.

	"Bye bye self respectI haven't had much of it since you leftI missed out on the best of you."

Flies.

	"Much like pheromones for flies, You will not avoid my eyes."

1998.

	"Some Fantastic" was one of the songs on the studio album "Stunt" by the Barenaked Ladies. It was released in 1998 and introduced the hit single "One Week".

questions.text: What will the singer work with?
questions.explanation:
Animals.

	"One day I will work with animals, All the tests I'm gonna do."

questions.text: Is this the correct lyric?: "I missed out on the best of me."
questions.explanation:
False.

	The correct lyric is "I missed out on the best of you."
